revision.comment: Rescuing 1 sources and tagging 0 as dead.) #IABot (v2.0.8
revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|nci|xuchichinancalli}} ===Etymology=== From {{compound|nci|xōchitl|t1=flower|chināncalli|t2=fenced enclosure}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|[ʃoː.t͡ʃi.t͡ʃi.naːŋˈka.lːi]}} ===Noun=== {{head|head=xōchichināncalli|nci|noun}} # a [[garden]], a [[flower]] [[garden]] #* '''1571''', [[w:Bernardino de Sahagún|Bernardino de Sahagún]], ''[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]'', f. 160r. col. 2. #*: '''xuchichinancalli'''. jardin. #*: ('''xuchichinancalli'''. garden.) ===References=== * “[https://web.archive.org/web/20161203034759/http://whp.uoregon.edu/dictionaries/nahuatl/index.lasso xochichinacalli]” in the ''Nahuatl Dictionary'', University of Oregon, 2011.
